description: The Republic of Ireland opens all retail, hairdressers, museums and libraries after six-week closure.
title: Coronavirus: Ireland's shops reopen as restrictions eased
title_page: Coronavirus: Ireland's shops reopen as restrictions eased - BBC News
maintext: Speaking to BBC Radio Foyle, the business owner said, if given the option, he would much rather have been closed for the past five weeks if it meant he could be open for the next two weeks in December.
